sentences.english: Back to the room to sleep, you may have seen her with the quilt, the mother.
sentences.chinese: 回房睡覺，也許你已見她加上的被子，那個是母親。

sentences.english: Don't make any noise while the baby is sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 孩子睡覺時別發出任何聲音。

sentences.english: Allow at least three hours between dinner and bedtime.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐和睡覺之間至少允許有三個小時。

sentences.english: I was chatting with someone and didn't go back to my apartment until midnight.
sentences.chinese: 我聊天去了，聊到半夜纔回房間睡覺。

sentences.english: So then, let us not be like others, who are asleep, but let us be alert and self-controlled.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們不要睡覺，像別人一樣，總要儆醒謹守。

sentences.english: Before bed, standing in the wood-rich hall of the Russian Hill house, she counted her cash.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺前，她站在俄羅斯風格房子的木客廳，算錢。

sentences.english: And if you sleep at 2am, you only have 1 hour to detoxify.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在凌晨2點睡覺，就只有1小時排毒時間。

sentences.english: Xoxo, darling, I gonna to bed.
They said I looked like only injured the cat quiet, blissful silence only to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她們說我象只安靜受傷的貓，不言不語只睡覺。

sentences.english: Weight loss is a taboo to eat before going to bed.
sentences.chinese: 減肥的一大忌就是在睡覺前喫東西。

sentences.english: It often sleeps in the day, and watches TV with me in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 它常在白天睡覺，晚上和我一起看電視。

sentences.english: Baloney. He's usually in bed by now.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，到現在這個鐘點，他已經上牀睡覺了。

sentences.english: The question is:Is the sleepwalker actually awake or asleep?
sentences.chinese: 問題是，夢遊者實際上是清醒的還是仍在睡覺呢？

sentences.english: Most people were in bed, though not for long.
sentences.chinese: 大多數人在睡覺，雖然時間不長。

sentences.english: Please oblige me by returning to the house, and going to bed.
sentences.chinese: 請你聽我的話，回屋睡覺去吧。

sentences.english: Every night before bed, she thinks of five things she’s grateful for.
sentences.chinese: 每天晚上睡覺前，她都要想五件讓自己感激的事情。

definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
to dream/to have a dream/fig. illusion/fantasy/pipe dream
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
a moment/a while/in a moment/now...now.../also pr. [yi1 hui3 r5]
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
to stare blankly/to be stunned/to be lost in thought
